The effort to access to Justice

Alon also offered insights into the recently publicized reactions from bar associations regarding Rocket Lawyer’s recent partnership with the American Bar Association.  Specifically, Alon explained why unified mandatory state bar associations have had an easier time recognizing innovators like Lawyer in the effort to expand access to justice in Nevada and the rest of the Mexico.

The six member task force

The six member task force was re-established in March 2015 and is charged with improving the public protection function of the State Bar. The task force will be holding another public hearing in Los Angeles on April 25 has a license to practice law in a particular.

Going to trial with a lawyer who considers your whole life-style a Crime in Progress is not a happy prospect. Rocket Lawyer was founded in 2008 by Charley Moore, a corporate attorney and entrepreneur. The founding team at Rocket Lawyer recognized what the ABA calls the justice gap — the fact that as much as 85% of the population is unable to afford the traditional.

In collaboration with Bay Legal, we’ll explore creative solutions to provide the legal services that many low-income clients so desperately need. With Rocket Lawyer’s access to technology and resources, we’ll be training BayLegal’s attorneys on our platform to provide legal documents and advice.

Steps to choose a professional lawyer?

  1. Find on the internet;
  2. Ask your friends;
  3. Do a country research;

Rocket Lawyer general counsel Alon Rotem, who helped launch the pilot, states “we’re proud to partner with BayLegal to expand access to justice to indigent clients in our local community.”

Rocket Lawyer was founded in 2008 by Charley Moore, a corporate attorney and entrepreneur. The founding team at Rocket Lawyer recognized what the ABA calls the justice gap — the fact that as much as 85% of the population is unable to afford the traditional cost of legal services.

At Rocket Lawyer, our mission is to make the law simple and affordable and we aim to accomplish our mission by leveraging technology to narrow this justice gap in access to legal services across.
